snippet: In this Danish film by Tobias Lindholm, an Oscar nominee for best foreign-language film, a commander faces trial after ordering an attack on civilians in Afghanistan.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews movie A War, directed by Tobias Lindholm and starring Pilou Asbaek.
lead_paragraph: In this Danish film by Tobias Lindholm, an Oscar nominee for best foreign-language film, a commander faces trial after ordering an attack on civilians in Afghanistan.

headline.main: Review: ‘A War’ Tracks a Conflict from Battle Zone to Court
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘A War’ Tracks a Conflict from Battle Zone to Court
